an1.51-60:10.1: “Accharāsaṅghātamattampi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettācittaṃ āsevati;
an1.51-60:10.3: ‘bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro, amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati’.
an1.51-60:10.4: Ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontī”ti.
an1.51-60:13.3: ‘bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro, amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati’.
an1.51-60:13.4: Ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontī”ti.
an1.51-60:16.1: “Accharāsaṅghātamattampi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettācittaṃ manasi karoti;
an1.51-60:16.3: ‘bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati’.
an1.51-60:16.4: Ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontī”ti.
an1.51-60:19.1: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā akusalapakkhikā, sabbe te manopubbaṅgamā.
an1.51-60:19.2: Mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, anvadeva akusalā dhammā”ti.
an1.51-60:22.1: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, dhammā kusalā kusalabhāgiyā kusalapakkhikā, sabbe te manopubbaṅgamā.
an1.51-60:22.2: Mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, anvadeva kusalā dhammā”ti.
an1.51-60:25.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā vā kusalā dhammā parihāyanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, pamādo.
an1.51-60:25.2: Pamattassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā ca kusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti.
an1.51-60:28.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā kusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā vā akusalā dhammā parihāyanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, appamādo.
an1.51-60:28.2: Appamattassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā ca akusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti.
an1.51-60:31.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā vā kusalā dhammā parihāyanti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, kosajjaṃ.
an1.51-60:31.2: Kusītassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā ca kusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti.
